Local.title: What we know about the shooting in Dayton, Ohio - CNN
Local.description: When a gunman opened fire on revelers enjoying a night out in Dayton, Ohio, early Sunday, he killed 9 people in less than a minute. It was the second mass shooting in the US in less than 24 hours. Here's what we know.
Local.content:
(CNN)When a gunman opened fire on revelers enjoying a night out in Dayton, Ohio, early Sunday, he killed nine people in less than a minute. It was the second mass shooting in the United States in less than 24 hours.
